title: Police Investigate Saline County Shooting
content:
SALINE COUNTY, Ark.--Police are investigating a shooting in Saline County.
According to authorities on scene near Mabelvale, the sheriff's office responded to a shots fired call.
There is no word yet on severity of the injuries or what led up to the shooting.
We've been told the shooting was not fatal.
